bodyV2.markdown:
Our LOVEtheatre vouchers are redeemable for up to one year from being purchased, though there is no need to see the show before the voucher’s expiry date so long as you book the show before the expiry date. 

Upon purchase one of our vouchers, you will receive an email with full instruction and the eVoucher, which will include a unique code for you to redeem when you check out. Simply add the tickets to your basket and copy the voucher code into the PROMO Code field. If valid there will be a green ticket with the voucher balance being taken off the total as shown below.

Where the amount on the voucher is more than the total, the remaining balance can be used towards another purchase, provided this is used prior to the expiry date. Where the amount on the voucher is less than the order balance, the outstanding balance will be shown and can be paid using a debit or credit card.

content.name: How do I redeem my gift voucher?
